meanings.definition: A group of compounds that have vitamin E activity.
meanings.sent1: Tocopherols are important for maintaining good health.
meanings.sent2: I make sure to include tocopherols in my diet for their vitamin E benefits.
meanings.sent3: The tocopherols in my daily supplements keep me feeling strong and healthy.
meanings.sent4: Like a shield, tocopherols protect our cells from harm.
meanings.sent5: The power of tocopherols to boost immunity is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: Antioxidants that protect cells from damage caused by free radicals.
meanings.sent1: Free radicals don't stand a chance against the tocopherols in our body.
meanings.sent2: Including tocopherols in your diet can help combat the harmful effects of free radicals.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine tocopherols as tiny superheroes fighting off free radicals in my body.
meanings.sent4: Tocopherols act like a shield, defending our cells from free radical attacks.
meanings.sent5: The role of tocopherols in protecting our cells is crucial for overall health.

meanings.sent1: Our body needs tocopherols to function properly.
meanings.sent2: Tocopherols are vital nutrients that support our overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: I like to think of tocopherols as the building blocks of a healthy body.
meanings.sent4: Just like water and air, tocopherols are essential for our health.
meanings.sent5: The importance of tocopherols in maintaining human health cannot be overstated.
